skills.name: Gouge
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of granting an Extra Turn. Decreases enemy MAX HP by 15% of damage dealt.
Damage based on
[ATK]
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.name: Outburst
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies 3 times. Places a 15%
[Weaken]
debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on
[ATK]
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Extinguish Life
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. This attack is always critical.
Damage based on
[ATK]
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Aura
skills.description: Increases Ally C. RATE in the Arena by 33%.
